title: Says Im in a game when Im not. PLEASE HELP
body: So I was playing a flex game with my friend and after the game stats just never loaded. After i clicked skip stats I was returned to the normal page, however when i tried to start a new game it said i couldn't. I then restarted league and it instantly loaded the TM client and asked me to reconnect. At this point I told my friend and he said it was happening to him too. Its been around 30 min now and we still cant do anything. Any ideas?

replies.body: You might be having an issue with a ghost game. The game servers might not have ever told your client that the match was over, so now it still thinks there's a game you need to reconnect to. Typically these will clear up with enough time, have you been able to get back in yet?

I have the same problem as you ! I did exactly like you and now I can't do anything ! I'm stuck with a recconect button and a game that I already finished !

Feelsbadman !
How long has it been for you?
